mapper.select: SELECT r.routine_brd_seq, r.routine_brd_title, r.routine_brd_content, r.routine_brd_regdate, r.routine_brd_hit, r.brd_image1, r.brd_image2, u.user_nickname FROM routineboard r JOIN user u ON r.user_email = u.user_email WHERE DATE_FORMAT(r.routine_brd_regdate,"%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() ORDER BY routine_brd_hit desc limit 0,2

SELECT r.routine_brd_seq, r.routine_brd_title, r.routine_brd_regdate, r.routine_brd_hit, r.brd_image1, r.brd_image2, u.user_nickname FROM routineboard r JOIN user u on r.user_email = u.user_email ORDER BY routine_brd_hit desc limit 0,2

SELECT f.free_brd_seq, f.free_brd_title, f.free_brd_content, f.free_brd_date, f.free_brd_hits, u.user_nickname FROM freeboard f JOIN user u ON f.user_email = u.user_email ORDER BY free_brd_date desc limit 0,8
SELECT notice_brd_seq, notice_brd_title FROM NoticeBoard ORDER BY notice_brd_regdate desc limit 4
